member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.NoError
member.summary: The associated condition is not a result of an error. For example, a GOAWAY might include this code to indicate graceful shutdown of a connection.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.ProtocolError
member.summary: The endpoint detected an unspecific protocol error. This error is for use when a more specific error code is not available.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.InternalError
member.summary: The endpoint encountered an unexpected internal error.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.FlowControlError
member.summary: The endpoint detected that its peer violated the flow-control protocol.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.SettingsTimeout
member.summary: The endpoint sent a SETTINGS frame but did not receive a response in a timely manner.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.StreamClosed
member.summary: The endpoint received a frame after a stream was half-closed.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.FrameSizeError
member.summary: The endpoint received a frame with an invalid size.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.RefusedStream
member.summary: The endpoint refused the stream prior to performing any application processing

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.Cancel
member.summary: Used by the endpoint to indicate that the stream is no longer needed.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.CompressionError
member.summary: The endpoint is unable to maintain the header compression context for the connection.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.ConnectError
member.summary: The connection established in response to a CONNECT request was reset or abnormally closed.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.EnhanceYourCalm
member.summary: The endpoint detected that its peer is exhibiting a behavior that might be generating excessive load.

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.InadequateSecurity
member.summary: The underlying transport has properties that do not meet minimum security requirements

member.name: F:HttpTwo.ErrorCode.Http11Required
member.summary: The endpoint requires that HTTP/1.1 be used instead of HTTP/2.
